divs: Sighting Detailswas outside smoking looking up into the sky noticed a lot of airplane activity saw around 15 to 20 planes flying about overhead and was watching them. when I notice the object in the sky coming from the northwest and heading to the southwest in a straight line it had 5 bright lights arranged on the bottom in a straight line I knew it wasn't a plane or helicopter or blimp because their was no green or red lights or blinking white lightI could see the bottom of the object looked almost like a plane fusilage but it had no wings made no sound the bottom looked to be silver or grey with some black swirling about it it took about a minute to 2 minutes to go from one side of the sky to the other when I eventually lost the lights in the cloud cover to the southwest with the clouds dimming the lights then eventually obscuring them the object was very big easily over 100-200 feet long maybe bigger not knowing what level the clouds were at that night was very excited during the event because I know it wasn't a terrestial craft afterwords had an adreninaline rush
Summary: was looking into night sky star gazing when I saw the ufo
trends: There have been 10 other sightings in Jackson
There were no other sightings in Jackson on or around November 12th 2012
